description: Total supply is equal to the sum of all user balances
expression: totalSupply == sum(balances[_] for all _ in addresses)

description: No user balance should be negative (SafeMath ensures this)
No allowance should be negative (SafeMath ensures this)
Transfer should not change total supply
TransferFrom should not change total supply
Sender’s balance should decrease by the transferred amount
Receiver’s balance should increase by the transferred amount
Sender must have at least the transfer amount
TransferFrom: sender must be approved for at least `_value`
Approve must either set to 0 or be called after allowance is zero
Initial supply must match the deployed totalSupply
Deployer's balance must equal total supply after construction
